LanguageData.Bullet_Zip.label: zip bullet
LanguageData.CEC_Zipper.label: boxed handgun
LanguageData.CEC_Zipper.description: Considered to be an oddity even around the Rim. Extreme care is necessary to not have one's fingers shot off with this trinket of a gun, but it's better than nothing.
LanguageData.CEC_Zipper.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_Zipper.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_LightHandgun.label: light handgun bullet
LanguageData.CEC_FiveSeven.label: light handgun
LanguageData.CEC_FiveSeven.description: A lightweight handgun manufactured with the same materials as the PDW, as well as use the same rounds designed to penetrate light armor which regular pistol rounds could not.
LanguageData.CEC_FiveSeven.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.CEC_FiveSeven.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Thunder.label: thunder bullet
LanguageData.CEC_Thunder.label: Thunder
LanguageData.CEC_Thunder.description: A rare breech-loaded single shot handgun that uses anti-materiel rounds.
LanguageData.CEC_Thunder.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.CEC_Thunder.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BigIron.label: big iron's bullet
LanguageData.CEC_BigIron.label: Big Iron
LanguageData.CEC_BigIron.description: To a settlement rode a stranger one fine day; hardly spoke to folks around him, didn't have too much to say, no one dared to ask his business, no one dared to make a slip; the stranger there among them had a big iron on his hip... Big Iron on his hip.
LanguageData.CEC_BigIron.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.CEC_BigIron.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_MuffaloCannon.label: muffalo blasted
LanguageData.CEC_MuffaloCannon.label: Muffalo Cannon
LanguageData.CEC_MuffaloCannon.description: From the muffalo's pouch, this shorty is quickly drawn in a caravan ambush. While not as intimidating as a regular shotgun, a blast from the mufallo cannon can still be staggering.
LanguageData.CEC_MuffaloCannon.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.CEC_MuffaloCannon.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_CombatShotgun.label: combat shotgun blast
LanguageData.CEC_CombatShotgun.label: combat shotgun
LanguageData.CEC_CombatShotgun.description: A shotgun used mainly by town guards in tight spaces. Its fairly decent round capacity makes it ideal for police raids.
LanguageData.CEC_CombatShotgun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_CombatShotgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.CEC_Bullet_LightCarbine.label: light carbine bullet
LanguageData.CEC_SkorpionEvo.label: light carbine
LanguageData.CEC_SkorpionEvo.description: A lightweight, blowback operated submachine gun that sprays out bullets at an incredible rate, giving it suitable stopping power for confined spaces.
LanguageData.CEC_SkorpionEvo.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_SkorpionEvo.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_ClockworkAR.label: clockwork AR bullet
LanguageData.CEC_ClockworkAR.label: clockwork assault rifle
LanguageData.CEC_ClockworkAR.description: An engineering marvel, often confused for spacer tech for its three-round salvo that fires before the recoil is even felt by the user. With an intimidatingly complex firing mechanism, disassembling this gun for maintenance is often compared to disassembling a mechanoid.
LanguageData.CEC_ClockworkAR.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_ClockworkAR.tools.1.label: internal clock
LanguageData.Bullet_PDW.label: PDW bullet
LanguageData.CEC_PDW.label: PDW
LanguageData.CEC_PDW.description: A compact and unique firearm manufactured with strong, lightweight plasteel. Often used for its close-quarters combat capabilities and its large magazine capacity.
LanguageData.CEC_PDW.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_PDW.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_WoodlandSMG.label: woodland SMG bullet
LanguageData.CEC_WoodlandSMG.label: woodland SMG
LanguageData.CEC_WoodlandSMG.description: This ancient-pattern submachine gun prides itself in its controllable recoil despite its high rate of fire and weight.
LanguageData.CEC_WoodlandSMG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_WoodlandSMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_CompactSR.label: compact service rifle bullet
LanguageData.CEC_CompactSR.label: compact service rifle
LanguageData.CEC_CompactSR.description: A shortened service rifle intended to cut manufacturing costs and bridge the gap between a submachine gun and an assault rifle. Quite reliable, but don't expect too much.
LanguageData.CEC_CompactSR.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_CompactSR.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_MRS.label: modern service rifle bullet
LanguageData.CEC_MRS.label: modern service rifle
LanguageData.CEC_MRS.description: An enhanced gas-operation rifle that significantly reduces its recoil with a counter-weight that simultaneously operates towards the opposite direction of the original gas piston.
LanguageData.CEC_MRS.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_MRS.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BurstRifle.label: burst rifle bullet
LanguageData.CEC_BurstRifle.label: burst rifle
LanguageData.CEC_BurstRifle.description: An experimental rifle, able to fire a burst of two rounds as fast as mechanically possible before the recoil is felt by the user. This increases the likelihood of a shot hitting the target while increasing target reacquisition with its short burst.
LanguageData.CEC_BurstRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_BurstRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_ASVal.label: subsonic bullet
LanguageData.CEC_SSRifle.label: subsonic rifle
LanguageData.CEC_SSRifle.description: A rifle designed with an integrated supressor. Its use of heavy subsonic ammunition increases its stealth capabilities by eliminating the sonic boom that comes with higher velocity calibers, and for this it has a shorter effective range.
LanguageData.CEC_SSRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_SSRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BattleRifle.label: battle rifle bullet
LanguageData.CEC_BattleRifle.label: battle rifle
LanguageData.CEC_BattleRifle.description: Semi-automatic rifle intended for medium to long range engagements.
LanguageData.CEC_BattleRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_BattleRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_LWAMG.label: lightweight machinegun bullet
LanguageData.CEC_LWAMG.label: lightweight assault machinegun
LanguageData.CEC_LWAMG.description: Despite its designation and looks, this machinegun boasts an incredibly light weight which enables its user to also use it as an assault weapon if not used for supressive fire.
LanguageData.CEC_LWAMG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_LWAMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_TMG.label: TMG bullet
LanguageData.CEC_TMG.label: trench machine gun
LanguageData.CEC_TMG.description: A relatively cheap machinegun ideal for providing surpressive fire.
LanguageData.CEC_TMG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_TMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_BullpupSniper.label: bullpup sniper bullet
LanguageData.CEC_BullpupSniper.label: bullpup sniper rifle
LanguageData.CEC_BullpupSniper.description: A semi-automatic precision rifle where the firing mechanism is located at the back of the gun, which shortens its overall length making it ideal for urban areas. Known to be actually quite rare.
LanguageData.CEC_BullpupSniper.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_BullpupSniper.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Saboteur.label: saboteur bullet
LanguageData.CEC_DVLTen.label: Saboteur
LanguageData.CEC_DVLTen.description: A long-range bolt-action sniper rifle originally found in urban northern areas. Known for its long range.
LanguageData.CEC_DVLTen.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_DVLTen.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Intervention.label: subatomic penetration rapid fire through your skull
LanguageData.CEC_Intervention.label: Intervention
LanguageData.CEC_Intervention.description: A bolt-action sniper rifle, renowned for its precision and range. A fair amount of record breaking shots within the Rim were fired from this rifle.
LanguageData.CEC_Intervention.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_Intervention.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_AntiMateriel.label: anti materiel bullet
LanguageData.CEC_AntiMaterielRifle.label: anti-materiel rifle
LanguageData.CEC_AntiMaterielRifle.description: A specialized anti-mechanoid rifle usually found at the hands of power armored and bionics augmented troopers strong enough to wield them.
LanguageData.CEC_AntiMaterielRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_AntiMaterielRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_Neopup.label: neopup round
LanguageData.CEC_Neopup.label: Neopup
LanguageData.CEC_Neopup.description: An anti-personnel grenade launcher used for breaching wooden walls and engaging small groups of enemies.
LanguageData.CEC_Neopup.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.CEC_Neopup.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.CEC_TacticalSledgeHammer.label: tactical sledgehammer
LanguageData.CEC_TacticalSledgeHammer.description: A sledgehammer equipped with a thermal scope, tacitcal flashlight and laser sights. The handle also includes an angled foregrip for increased ergonomics. Really, what makes this expensive is the thermal scope.
LanguageData.CEC_TacticalSledgeHammer.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.CEC_TacticalSledgeHammer.tools.1.label: handle
LanguageData.CEC_TacticalSledgeHammer.tools.2.label: broken scope glass shards
